title: How to Deodorize Shoes
summary: Using baking soda and tea bags to remove odors from shoes.
content: To deodorize shoes with baking soda and tea bags, sprinkle a generous amount of baking soda inside each shoe and shake to distribute it evenly. Place a dry tea bag in each shoe to absorb moisture and odors. Leave the baking soda and tea bags in the shoes overnight. In the morning, remove the tea bags and shake out the baking soda. The combination will neutralize odors and leave your shoes smelling fresh.
